_Main:DMCA.description: Set to false to DISABLE all potentially copyrighted sounds.

_Main:FamilyFriendly.description: Set to false to DISABLE all non-family friendly sounds.

_Main:Music.description: Toggle all sound changes in the Music category

_Main:IndoorEntities.description: Toggle all sound changes for indoor entities

_Main:OutdoorEntities.description: Toggle all sound changes for outdoor entities

_Main:Traps.description: Toggle all sound changes for traps

_Main:Interface.description: Toggle all sound changes for the interface

_Main:Terminal.description: Toggle all sound changes for the terminal

_Main:Environment.description: Toggle all sound changes for the environment

_Main:Items.description: Toggle all sound changes for items

Music:VanillaSounds.description: Set to false to DISABLE all vanilla Lethal Company music sounds.

Music:MainMenu.description: Toggle the menu music sound changes

Music:IntroSpeech.description: Toggle the intro speech sound changes

Music:AmbientMusic.description: Toggle the ambient music sound changes

Music:StartOfDay.description: Toggle the changes of the sound cue that plays when you first leave the ship

Music:GameOver.description: Toggle the music that plays when you fail to meet quota. Also includes the "fired" sound change.

Music:AllPlayersDead.description: Toggle the All Players Dead stinger sound changes

Music:DropPod.description: Toggle the drop pod music sound changes

Music:Boombox.description: Toggle the boombox music sound changes

Music:RecordPlayer.description: Toggle the record player sound changes

IndoorEntities:SoundCues.description: Toggle whether monsters can play sound cues

IndoorEntities:HoardingBug.description: Toggle the hoarding bug sound changes (I wouldn't blame you)

IndoorEntities:SnareFleaStranglingMusic.description: Toggle the music that plays when a snare flea is strangling you

IndoorEntities:GhostGirlChimes.description: Toggle the rare chance the ghost girl bell chime sound changes

OutdoorEntities:SoundCues.description: Toggle whether monsters can play sound cues (only eyeless dog as of now)

OutdoorEntities:EyelessDogEating.description: Toggle the eyeless dog eating sound change

OutdoorEntities:Bees.description: Toggle the circuit bees sound changes

OutdoorEntities:BaboonHawk.description: Toggle the baboon hawk sound changes

Interface:VanillaSounds.description: Set to false to DISABLE all vanilla Lethal Company music sounds. (does not apply for the entity scanned sound)

Interface:ReachedQuota.description: Toggle the reached quota sound changes

Interface:EntityScanned.description: Toggle the entity scanned sound changes

Interface:ScrapCollection.description: Toggle the scrap collection sound changes

Interface:RewardTune.description: Toggle the reward tune sound changes

Interface:FurnitureMoving.description: Toggle the furniture moving sound changes

Environment:Venting.description: Toggle the vent crawling sound changes
